com.fiternity.service.junit

Class FiternityLocalServiceImplTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • com.fiternity.service.junit.FiternityLocalServiceImplTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    @PrepareForTest(value=com.fiternity.service.FiternityLocalServiceUtil.class)
public class FiternityLocalServiceImplTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase
    This is a testing class for FiternityLocalServiceUtil.So here, we mock that class to write test cases and validate generated output are same as expected for given input. All methods are mocking FiternityLocalServiceUtil's methods and it does not return any value.

        public void testAddStudio()

                          com.fiternity.NullException,
                          com.fiternity.UnknownException

        com.fiternity.SQLGrammerException - throws when SQL syntax generated for you is incorrect.
        com.fiternity.NumberFormatException - throws when we convert from string to numeric value.
        com.fiternity.NullException - throws when null value is assigned to an object reference.
        com.fiternity.UnknownException - throws runtime exception.
